tool_description: An API to follow up on climate changes anywhere in the world.
title: Climate News Update

api_list.name: Get Individual News Platform Update
api_list.description: Get News about Climate Change from a specific news platform
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-news-update.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-news-update.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
